text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly states that a GIP can recruit agents under a private law regime (CDI/CDD under the Code du travail) even for public service activities. It cites the default private law regime for GIP staff employment under Article 7 of Decree No. 2004-1005 and confirms this applies regardless of the public service nature of the activities. This directly satisfies the criterion requiring the statement that there are legal ways for a GIP to recruit personnel under a private law regime.", "criterion_id": "af52450c-5912-4bd9-afbb-6c409291615e"}
